interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Witch: Subversion
Review Date: 2021/11/21
Store: Choi Woo-shik  (Actor),     Kim Da-mi  (Actor),     Park Hoon-jung  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Product Description', '10 years ago, Ja-yoon escaped from a secret government facility in the midst of an inexplicable incident. An old couple finds her alone near death in the woods and takes her in even though she has no memory of who she is or how she got there. She grows up to be a bright high school student and enters a nationally televised audition program to win the top prize and help her struggling family. But as soon as she appears on TV, strange people start appearing in her life and Ja-yoon falls into turmoil as her seemingly ordinary life turns upside down in a blink of an eye Featuring an award-winning performance by Kim Da-mi and co-starring Choi Woo-shik (PARASITE, TRAIN TO BUSAN).', 'Review', 'the action sensation of the year that could rival any superhero movie --Starburst Magazinea kick-ass sci-fi action flick, with a satisfying gore factor to boot. --NerdlyAn ever-so-delicate twist on the Korean revenge thriller. --The Hollywood Reporter', 'About the Actor', 'Choi Woo-shik is known for Parasite (2019), Okja (2017), Set Me Free (2014), and Train to Busan (2016).', 'About the Director', 'Park Hoon-jung is known for New World (2013), The Tiger (2015), V.I.P. (2017), and I Saw the Devil (2010).', 'See more']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.92 Ounces', 'Director': 'Park Hoon-jung', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Subtitled, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Run time': '2 hours and 7 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 10, 2020', 'Actors': 'Choi Woo-shik, Kim Da-mi, Cho Min-soo, Park Hee-soon', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Language': 'Korean (DTS 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Well Go Usa', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: the title can throw you off. would like to see the story continue with a sequel with same cast.
Review Title: likeable story and great characters on display.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Underworld: Blood Wars
Kate Beckinsale  (Actor),     Theo James  (Actor),     Anna Foerster  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['In the next installment of the blockbuster franchise, Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fends off brutal attacks from both the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. With her only allies, David (Theo James) and his father Thomas (Charles Dance), she must stop the eternal war between Lycans and Vampires, even if it means she has to make the ultimate sacrifice.']

Five Stars
The Thousand Faces of Dunjia [Blu-ray]
Ni Ni  (Actor),     Dongyu Zhou  (Actor),     Yuen Woo-ping  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
['Product Description', 'Centuries ago, the ragtag warrior-sorcerors of the Wuyin clan were entrusted to safeguard China from threats beyond our plane of existence. But can even their skills keep a world-destroying device from the clutches of the alien invaders determined to claim it? Splashy big-budget Wuxia fantasy-actioner, directed by Woo-ping Yuen and scripted by Tsui Hark, stars Da Peng, Ni Ni, Wu Bai, Dongyu Zhou, and Arif Rahman Lee. 113 min. Widescreen; Soundtrack: Mandarin; Subtitles: English; featurette; theatrical trailer. In Mandarin with English subtitles.', 'Review', 'Dunjia is exuberant and visually inventive" --Washington PostDelightful twists and turns and high energy performances --Film Combat SyndicateDunjia is a blast --Film Journal International']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preferences:** Continues to enjoy action, sci-fi, horror, and thriller genres in film and television, demonstrating a strong inclination towards high-energy narratives and inventive storytelling.
- **Franchise Engagement:** Engages with established franchises, remaining particularly loyal to those in the horror and action domains.
- **Adaptation Interest:** Shows a consistent preference for stories adapted from popular video game franchises, reflecting an interest in expansive, immersive worlds and rich narratives.
- **Format Preference:** Open to Blu-ray format, highlighting a commitment to improved media quality and latest releases.
- **High Ratings:** Consistently rates content highly, often giving five-star reviews, showcasing an appreciation for engaging storytelling and compelling performances.
- **Multilingual Content:** Enjoys films with multilingual features and subtitles, indicating an interest in diverse narratives and accessibility for non-native speakers.
- **Engagement with Actors:** Shows admiration for specific actors, often praising their performances, illustrating a connection to talent and individual creativity within preferred genres.
- **Preference for Unique Narratives:** Recently expressed interest in visually inventive stories and engaging characters, emphasizing a desire for fresh and dynamic content.
- **Recent Interests:** Displays a taste for character-driven stories with a potential for continuing narratives, indicating a preference for narratives that can evolve and expand, reinforcing their loyalty to high-quality actors and unique plots.

In summary, the user favors immersive, high-energy narratives, embraces newer formats, and values diverse and original storytelling while expressing a keen interest in evolving character arcs within beloved genres.
